item.title: Am I a Fraud ?
item.description: Imposter syndrome, a struggle experienced by many, has been a constant presence in my life. Despite my coding skills and technical knowledge, there are times when I can’t help but feel like a fraud, merely faking my way through. But I’ve come to realize that imposter syndrome is a common phenomenon, and I am not alone in this battle. Through self-reflection and embracing my true abilities, I’ve learned to navigate these feelings and grow both personally and professionally.
